data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Update On Entering Into New Agreement
data.news_body: Company has entered into Strategic Port Handling Agreement with Karanja Terminal and Logistics Private Limited and has secured exclusive rights to handle dry bulk and liquid cargo at a dedicated 200 meter water front facility at Karanja Creek Raigad District Maharashtra.

30(6) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body:

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Update On Admiralty Proceedings
data.news_body:
In continuation of our disclosures dated December 27 2025 and January 07 2026 intimating developments in relation to the ongoing Admiralty proceedings we wish to further inform that the Company has filed two applications before the Honble High Court of Gujarat as follows:
(1) an application seeking reduction of the security amount for the release of the five (5) of our vessels; and 
(2) an application seeking vacation of the order of arrest in respect of all five (5) vessels.

Both the applications have been filed without prejudice to the Companys rights and contentions and without any admission of liability.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Update On Admiralty Proceedings
data.news_body: In continuation of our disclosure dated December 27 2025 informing on development in relation to the ongoing litigation we hereby inform that the Honble High Court of Gujarat has passed an interim order dated January 06 2026. The Company is in compliance with the directions of the Honble High Court of and is contesting the matter on merits. The Company has initiated and is actively pursuing further legal proceedings in this regard.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. On September 13 2025 In Terms Of Second Proviso To Regulation
30(6) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body:
With reference to captioned subject we would like to inform you that Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations) the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on today i.e. Saturday September 13 2025 at Taj Lands End Band Stand Bandra West Mumbai has inter-alia:
1. Considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30 2025 in accordance with the provisions of Regulation 33 of the SEBI Listing Regulations along with the Limited Review Report issued by Statutory Auditor.

2. Considered and approved all other businesses as per agenda circulated.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration Of Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On June 30 2025
data.news_body:
Shreeji Shipping Global Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/09/2025 inter alia to consider and approve 1. Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30 2025 as per Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulation;
2. Consider and discuss any other business items as may be decided by the Board of Directors of the Company.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI(PIT) Regulation 2015 the Trading Window for dealing in securities of the company will be closed from Thursday September 04 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of Financial Result for the Quarter ended June 30 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Shreeji Shipping Global Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 26 2025 the equity shares of Shreeji Shipping Global Ltd (Scrip Code: 544490) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250825- dated August 25 2025.
